remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 数据绑定为应用程序呈现数据并与数据交互提供了一种简单且一致的方式。 data binding provides a simple and consistent way for applications to present and interact with data. 数据绑定，您可以同步两个不同的对象的属性的值。Data binding enables you to synchronize the values of the properties of two different objects. 若要建立绑定，请使用类或某个其他类继承的。To establish a binding, use the class or one of the other classes that inherit . 而不考虑哪些对象要绑定和数据源的特性，每个绑定也遵循下图所示的模型。Regardless of what object you are binding and the nature of your data source, each binding follows the model illustrated by the following figure. ![基本数据绑定示意图](~/add/media/databindingmostbasic.png "基本数据绑定示意图")![Basic data binding diagram](~/add/media/databindingmostbasic.png "Basic data binding diagram") 该图演示了以下基本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]数据绑定概念。The figure demonstrates the following fundamental [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding concepts. - 每个绑定通常都具有以下四个组件： 绑定目标对象、 目标属性、 绑定源，和一个到要使用的绑定源中的值。Each binding typically has these four components: a binding target object, a target property, a binding source, and a to the value in the binding source to use. 例如，如果你想要的内容绑定到 Employee 对象的 Name 属性，您的目标对象是，目标属性是属性，要使用的值是名称，并且源对象是员工对象。For example, if you want to bind the content of a to the Name property of an Employee object, your target object is the , the target property is the property, the value to use is Name, and the source object is the Employee object. - 目标属性必须为依赖属性。The target property must be a dependency property. 这也意味着您不能将字段绑定。This also means that you cannot bind a field. 大多数属性对象是依赖项属性，大多数依赖项属性，除了只读属性，默认情况下支持数据绑定。Most properties of objects are dependency properties and most dependency properties, except read-only ones, support data binding by default. (仅类型可以定义依赖关系属性和所有对象派生自。)(Only types can define dependency properties and all objects derive from .) - 尽管图中并未指出，但请注意，绑定源对象并不限于自定义 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 对象。Although not specified in the figure, it should be noted that the binding source object is not restricted to being a custom [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 数据绑定支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 对象和 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 形式的数据。 data binding supports data in the form of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] objects and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]. 若要提供一些示例，绑定源可以是，任何列表对象、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]与关联的对象[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_adonet](~/includes/tlasharptla-adonet-md.md)]数据或 Web 服务或 XmlNode 包含你[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据。To provide some examples, your binding source may be a , any list object, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object that is associated with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_adonet](~/includes/tlasharptla-adonet-md.md)] data or Web Services, or an XmlNode that contains your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data. 使用属性来指定数据流的方向。Use the property to specify the direction of the data flow. 若要检测源更改中单向或双向绑定，源必须实现一种合适的属性更改通知机制如。To detect source changes in one-way or two-way bindings, the source must implement a suitable property change notification mechanism such as . 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 实现属性更改通知](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md)。For an example, see [How to: Implement Property Change Notification](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md). 属性指定的源更新时间。The property specifies the timing of source updates. 详细信息，请参阅"基本数据绑定概念"中[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see "Basic Data Binding Concepts" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐式使用默认转换器，尝试执行类型转换的源值和目标值之间的绑定。A binding implicitly uses a default converter that tries to do a type conversion between the source value and the target value. 如果不能进行转换，默认转换器会返回 `null`。If a conversion cannot be made, the default converter returns `null`. 如果你想要将自定义值转换器与绑定相关联，则应创建实现的类接口，并提供用于实现和方法。If you want to associate a custom value converter with a binding, you should create a class that implements the interface and supply implementations for the and methods. 值转换器可以将数据从一种类型更改为另一种、 区域性的详细信息，例如字符集之间进行转换或修改其表示形式的其他方面。Value converters can change data from one type to another, translate between cultural details such as character sets, or modify other aspects of their presentation. 典型转换方案的示例，请参阅"数据转换"中[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For examples of typical conversion scenarios, see "Data Conversion" in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个绑定通常都具有以下四个组件： 绑定目标对象、 目标属性、 绑定源和要使用的绑定源中的值的路径。Each binding typically has these four components: a binding target object, a target property, a binding source, and a path to the value in the binding source to use. 有关这些数据绑定概念的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about these data binding concepts, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 使用属性来指定你想要将绑定到的源值：Use the property to specify the source value you want to bind to: - 在最简单的情况下，属性值是要使用的绑定，如下所示的源对象的属性名称`Path=PropertyName`。In the simplest case, the property value is the name of the property of the source object to use for the binding, such as `Path=PropertyName`. - 可以通过类似于在 C# 中使用的语法指定属性的子属性。Subproperties of a property can be specified by a syntax similar to that used in C#. 例如，子句 `Path=ShoppingCart.Order` 设置与对象或属性 `ShoppingCart` 的子属性 `Order` 的绑定。For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart.Order` sets the binding to the subproperty `Order` of the object or property `ShoppingCart`. - 若要绑定到附加属性，请将附加属性置于括号中。To bind to an attached property, place parentheses around the attached property. 例如，若要将绑定到附加属性的语法是`Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`。For example, to bind to the attached property , the syntax is `Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`. - 可以在已应用索引器的属性名后面的方括号内指定属性的索引器。Indexers of a property can be specified within square brackets following the property name where the indexer is applied. 例如，子句 `Path=ShoppingCart[0]` 将绑定设置为与属性的内部索引处理文本字符串“0”的方式对应的索引。For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart[0]` sets the binding to the index that corresponds to how your property's internal indexing handles the literal string "0". 此外支持多个索引器。Multiple indexers are also supported. - 可以在 `Path` 子句中混用索引器和子属性，例如 `Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].`Indexers and subproperties can be mixed in a `Path` clause; for example, `Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].` - 可以在索引器内使用多个由逗号 (,) 分隔的索引器参数。Inside indexers you can have multiple indexer parameters separated by commas (,). 可以使用括号指定每个参数的类型。The type of each parameter can be specified with parentheses. 例如，可以使用 `Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`，其中 `sys` 将映射到 `System` 命名空间。For example, you can have `Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`, where `sys` is mapped to the `System` namespace. - 如果源是集合视图，则可以使用斜杠 (/) 指定当前项。When the source is a collection view, the current item can be specified with a slash (/). 例如，子句 `Path=/` 设置与视图中当前项的绑定。For example, the clause `Path=/` sets the binding to the current item in the view. 如果源是集合，则此语法指定默认集合视图的当前项。When the source is a collection, this syntax specifies the current item of the default collection view. - 可以组合使用属性名和斜杠，以遍历作为集合的属性。Property names and slashes can be combined to traverse properties that are collections. 例如，`Path=/Offices/ManagerName` 指定源集合的当前项，源集合中包含的 `Offices` 属性也是一个集合。For example, `Path=/Offices/ManagerName` specifies the current item of the source collection, which contains an `Offices` property that is also a collection. 它的当前项是一个包含 `ManagerName` 属性的对象。Its current item is an object that contains a `ManagerName` property. - 句点 (.) 路径也可以用于绑定到当前源。Optionally, a period (.) path can be used to bind to the current source. 例如，`Text="{Binding}"` 与 `Text="{Binding Path=.}"` 等效。For example, `Text="{Binding}"` is equivalent to `Text="{Binding Path=.}"`. 路径语法的信息，请参阅[绑定声明概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md)或[PropertyPath XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。For information about path syntax, see [Binding Declarations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md) or [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md). 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]绑定的更多信息，请参阅属性。For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] bindings, see the property. 若要绑定到整个对象，您不必指定属性。To bind to an entire object, you do not need to specify the property. 详细信息，请参阅"指定路径为值"中[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see "Specifying the Path to the Value" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示创建一个样式触发器报告验证错误消息。The following example shows a style trigger that creates a that reports a validation error message.
